TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MessageBoxImage extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the icon that is displayed by a message box.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows the different message box icons.
||| |-|-| |![Hand icon](~/add/media/messagebox-hand.gif "Hand icon")|Hand| |![Question icon](~/add/media/messagebox-question.gif "Question icon")|Question| |![Exclamation icon](~/add/media/messagebox-exclamation.gif "Exclamation icon")|Exclamation| |![Asterisk icon](~/add/media/messagebox-asterisk.gif "Asterisk icon")|Asterisk| |![Stop icon](~/add/media/messagebox-stop.gif "Stop icon")|Stop| |![Error icon](~/add/media/messagebox-error.gif "Error icon")|Error| |![Warning icon](~/add/media/messagebox-warning.gif "Warning icon")|Warning| |![Information icon](~/add/media/messagebox-information.gif "Information icon")|Information|
For a sample that demonstrates several options when using the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox>, see [MessageBox Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160023).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxImage Asterisk = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a lowercase letter i in a circle.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxImage Error = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of white X in a circle with a red background.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxImage Exclamation = int32(48)

Docs.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of an exclamation point in a triangle with a yellow background.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxImage Hand = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a white X in a circle with a red background.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxImage Information = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a lowercase letter i in a circle.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxImage None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxImage Question = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a question mark in a circle.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxImage Stop = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of white X in a circle with a red background.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxImage Warning = int32(48)

Docs.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of an exclamation point in a triangle with a yellow background.
